text: Streets of Rage 4 is a beat 'em up video game. It was released in Japan and Asia as . It was made by Lizardcube, Guard Crush Games and Dotemu and published by Sega and Dotemu in 2020. The game can be run on Microsoft Windows, Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and Nintendo Switch. It is the fourth game in the Streets of Rage series. It is a sequel to Streets of Rage 3. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:2020 video games Category:Streets of Rage Category:Cooperative video games Category:IOS games Category:Nintendo Switch games Category:Organized crime video games Category:PlayStation 4 games Category:Side-scrolling beat 'em ups Category:Video game sequels Category:Windows games Category:Xbox One games
title: Streets of Rage 4
